title: Clarify admin portal wording and add Payment Methods shortcut

requirements.summary: Rename admin-facing labels from “Receiving Accounts/Accounts” to “Payment Methods” while keeping /admin/accounts route unchanged and avoiding new public admin entry points.
acceptanceCriteria: In the admin header/navigation, the link currently labeled “Accounts” is relabeled to “Payment Methods” (or “Payment Accounts”) without changing its destination route (/admin/accounts).
The /admin/accounts page title and description are updated to use the same “Payment Methods/Payment Accounts” wording (English).
No public pages (/, /status) expose an “Admin Login” entry point beyond the existing behavior (login button only shown when already authenticated or on an /admin route).

file_operations.description: Update the admin navigation label for the existing /admin/accounts link from “Accounts” to “Payment Methods” (or “Payment Accounts”), keeping the route unchanged and preserving the existing conditional display behavior (no new public admin entry point). Uses existing shadcn-ui Button and TanStack Router Link composition—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update page heading/description and key user-facing text strings to use “Payment Methods/Payment Accounts” wording (e.g., page title, empty state, dialog titles/descriptions, and action labels as appropriate) while keeping the page mounted at /admin/accounts. Uses existing shadcn-ui Card/Dialog/Button composition—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

Update any admin-visible references to “Receiving Account(s)” where they refer to the fee payment destination selection to instead say “Payment Method(s)/Payment Account(s)”, without changing underlying behavior. Uses existing composed UI components—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.

requirements.summary: Add a clear “Payment Methods” navigation action within the Admin Dashboard for quick access to /admin/accounts within the existing admin-guarded area.
acceptanceCriteria: Admin Dashboard includes a clearly visible button/link labeled “Payment Methods” (or “Payment Accounts”) that navigates to /admin/accounts.
The button/link is only visible/usable to authenticated admins (i.e., within the existing AdminGuard-protected area).

file_operations.description: Add a prominent “Payment Methods/Payment Accounts” Button/Link on the Admin Dashboard that navigates to /admin/accounts. Keep this inside the existing AdminGuard-protected dashboard route (no public exposure). Uses TanStack Router Link and shadcn-ui Button/Card composition—Verify the component's usage instructions before implementing.
